nodes.text: Dasch Nilraan was a male Human who served as a Captain in the Knights of Zakuul. In 3631 BBY, during the Battle of Asylum between the Eternal Empire and The Commander, he was killed by the Outlander.

Dasch Nilraan was first added to the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic as part of the Digital Expansion Star Wars: The Old Republic: Knights of the Fallen Empire, where he first appeared in Chapter 8: Taking Flight.
